parameters.name: app_name
parameters.description: The application name (used as a prefix for resource names).

parameters.name: azure_instance_count
parameters.description: The number of VM instances to create in Microsoft Azure.

parameters.name: azure_instance_type
parameters.description: The type (size) of Azure Virtual Machines instance to create.

parameters.name: azure_region
parameters.description: The Azure region code (e.g. westus).

parameters.name: azure_region_name
parameters.description: The Azure region name (e.g. West US).

parameters.name: ddcloud_instance_count
parameters.description: The number of VM instances to create in Dimension Data CloudControl.

parameters.name: ddcloud_region
parameters.description: The CloudControl region code (e.g. AU, NA, EU).

parameters.name: ddcloud_datacenter
parameters.description: The CloudControl data center Id (e.g. NA1, AU9).

parameters.name: aws_instance_count
parameters.description: The number of VM instances to create in Amazon Web Services (AWS) EC2.

parameters.name: aws_instance_type
parameters.description: The type (size) of EC2 instance to create.

parameters.name: aws_region
parameters.description: The AWS region code (e.g. us-west-1).

parameters.name: azure_subscription_id
parameters.description: The Azure subscription Id.

parameters.name: azure_client_id
parameters.description: The Azure client Id (used to authenticate to =Azure Resource Manager).

parameters.name: azure_client_secret
parameters.description: The Azure client secret (used to authenticate to =Azure Resource Manager).

parameters.name: azure_tenant_id
parameters.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant Id (used to authenticate to =Azure Resource Manager).

parameters.name: azure_storage_rg_name
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the storage account used to store virtual machine disks.

parameters.name: azure_storage_acct_name
parameters.description: The name of the Azure storage account used to store virtual machine disks.

parameters.name: ddcloud_user
parameters.description: The CloudControl user name (used to authenticate to Dimension Data CloudControl).

parameters.name: ddcloud_password
parameters.description: The CloudControl password (used to authenticate to Dimension Data CloudControl).

parameters.name: aws_access_key
parameters.description: The AWS access key (used to authenticate to AWS).

parameters.name: aws_secret_key
parameters.description: The AWS secret key (used to authenticate to AWS).
